pages.text: As the name suggests, this ship is all about taking risks and making tradeoffs.
Free to use. If your next attack hits a target, double your current energy. If you miss, half it instead.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: For every hit, you gain 1 energy. For every miss, you lose 1 energy. This also happens when using abilities!
pages.title: Passive Ability
